Title: Requires a study and report on the total cost of student assessments and establishes a committee to review content on standardized test items and passages; appropriation
Summary: Requires a study and report on the total cost of student assessments and establishes a committee to review content on standardized test items and passages; makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a study and report on the total cost of developing all student assessments and to establish a content review committee to review standardized test items and passages; and making an appropriation therefor
